data.title: Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol
meta_keywords: Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol New York
Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol Nederlander Theater
Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol Nederlander Theater New York
data.meta_description: Tony winner Jefferson Mays brings Dickens' classic to life. Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol at the Nederlander Theater, New York, NY. Closed January 1, 2023.  Buy tickets online now or find out more with New York City Theater
data.text:
Starring Jefferson Mays

Broadway's critically acclaimed holiday production! The yuletide classic arrives at the Geffen in a brand new adaptation by Tony winner Jefferson Mays (Oslo, A Gentleman's Guide to Love and Murder). This new take is based on the version of A Christmas Carol that Dickens himself used to perform on his live reading tours. Mays will be doing a master class of a performance in playing over 50 roles in this inspiring performance.

As everyone knows, Christmas Carol follows the story of the miserly business man Ebenezer Scrooge, who hates the holiday season and makes it a misery for his employee Bob Cratchet. However, Scrooge's life is turned around by the visit of three spirits, the ghosts of Christmas past, present and future, who show him the real meaning of the holiday season.
